TELiX MSG: 5FE9A 21/08/24 13:40 +03:00
JOIN MARITIME INC. - GREECE - TEL:+30 210 9850800 - FAX:+30 210 9844801
E-MAIL : chartering@joinmaritime.com
-/MF
GD DAY
PLS PPOSE FOR BELOW VERY CLOSE LOCAL HANDY
OPEN YALOVA 5-8 SEP (EX DD)
----------------------------
CLEAN CARGOES ONLY!
M/V IVORY GULL
----
33,013 DWT / 2009 BUILT / 4x30T SWL CR
DESCR ASF:
M/V IVORY GULL
---------------
LIBERIA FLAG 2009 BLT
DWT 33,013 MT ON S.DRAFT 10.20M
GRT 19,992 / NRT 11,905
LOA 177.4M / BEAM 28.20M
TPC: 45.10
5H/5H HYDRAULIC FOLDING HATCHCOVERS
4X30T SWL ELECTRO HYDRAULIC CRANES
CUBIC CAPACITY: GRAIN / BALE PER HOLD:
H1: 6,786.60 CBM / 6,491.52 CBM
H2: 9,069.09 CBM / 8,674.07 CBM
H3: 9,071.88 CBM / 8,676.73 CBM
H4: 9,078.69 CBM / 8,676.94 CBM
H5: 8,195.77 CBM / 7,835.16 CBM
GRAIN / BALE: 42,202.030 CBM / 40,354.420 CBM
TANKTOP/DECK/H.COVER STRENGTH:
HOLD TANKTOP:
H 1,3,5: 20 MT/M2
H 2,4: 18 MT/M2
DECK: 1.0 MT/M2
HATCH COVER: 1-5   2.3 MT/M2
SPEED AND CONSUMPTIONS:
AT SEA:
(BALLAST) ABT 12.0 KTS ABT 16.0 MT VLSFO
(LADEN) ABT 11.5 KTS ABT 16.5 MT VLSFO
IF BOILER USED PLUS 1.0 MT/D VLSFO
IN PORT:
(IDLE) ABT 2.5 MT VLSFO
(WORKING) ABT 4.0 MT VLSFO
BUNKER GRADES:
--------------------
VLSFO / ISO SPECS 2010
LSMGO DMA / ISO SPECS 2010
VESSEL WARRANTED TO PERFORM IN GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS ONLY, DEFINED AS UP TO
BEAUFORT FORCE 4
AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3, EVEN KEEL, NO ADVERSE CURRENTS, NO ADVERSE SWELL.
IN E.U. PORTS AND OTHER SECA AREAS THE VESSEL MUST BURN LSMGO (MAX 0.1% S) AS
PER LATEST ECA/MARPOL RULES.
VESSEL HAS THE LIBERTY TO CONSUME MGO/MDO AND/OR EXTRA IFO WHEN:
ENTERING-LEAVING PORTS, WHILST ON ROADS - ANCHORAGE, UNDER PILOTAGE,
BERTHING/UNBERTHING,
WHILE BALLAST WATER EXCHANGE , HOLD'S CLEANING, NAVIGATING/MANOEUVERING IN
CONFINED / SHALLOW /
CONGESTED/RESTRICTED WATERS, RIVERS, CHANNEL, WHEN NAVIGATING IN FOG.
SPEED / CONSUMPTION IS ALWAYS GIVEN ON ABOUT BASIS. ABOUT IS UNDERSTOOD TO
MEAN ABOUT 0.5 KNOTS
DOWNWARDS IN THE SPEED AND ABOUT 5PCT UPWARDS IN THE CONSUMPTION IN ALL CASES.
ADA
BRGDS
MICHAEL FLOROS
JOIN MARITIME INC.
MOB: 0030 6942556220
SKYPE: M_FLOROS
